calculations.name: Side Panel Height (Sink Base)
calculations.note: TCS Rule: Sink bases have NO stretchers - sides go full height to compensate

gate_5_stretchers.title: Stretcher Dimensions & Positions

tcs_standard.rule: Stretcher splits the gap between drawer faces

gate_5_stretchers.sink_base_note: TCS Rule: Sink bases have NO stretchers - sides extend +3/4" to compensate

calculations.name: Stretcher Count
calculations.note: Side panels compensate by extending +3/4" for countertop support

pieces.notes: TCS: Back is FULL BOX HEIGHT (toe kick is front only)
Laid FLAT - doubles as stretcher (TCS rule)

false_fronts.tcs_rule: All false fronts have backing that doubles as stretcher

pieces.notes: Depth includes +0.5" install overage. Miter 45° to face frame.
Depth includes +0.5" install overage. Miter 45° to face frame.

tcs_rules: Mitered at 45° to face frame stiles
1/4" gap between cabinet side and end panel

drawer_dados.applies_to: All drawer box pieces (2 drawers × 4 pieces = 8 pieces)
drawer_dados.notes: Cut dado in all 4 pieces (2 sides + front + back) before assembly. Bottom panel floats in dado.

height_from_bottom.note: Measured from bottom of opening to bottom of runner

setback_from_face.note: Frameless: runner flush with face; Face-frame: behind frame

runner_mounting.notes: Use at least 2 screws in elongated holes. Mark height line across BOTH sides for alignment.

locking_device_holes.tool: 6mm brad point bit with depth stop
locking_device_holes.applies_to: Drawer box sides (2 drawers × 2 sides = 4 bores)

specs.position: Per template - front bottom of drawer side

locking_device_holes.notes: Bore on OUTSIDE face of drawer sides. Use template for accurate 75° angle location.

minimum_rear_notch.note: Drawer back must clear rear bracket

rear_hook_holes.notes: Bore on OUTSIDE face of drawer back. One hole each side, measured from bottom corner.

edge_banding.tool: Iron-on edge banding or PVC edge bander
edge_banding.notes: Apply edge banding before assembly. Trim flush with edge trimmer.

pocket_holes.tool: Kreg pocket hole jig (3/4" material setting)
pocket_holes.notes: Drill pocket holes in ends of ALL rails before assembly. Stiles receive the screws.

false_front_1_backing.notes: Laid FLAT - doubles as stretcher (TCS rule)
